page.title: 13FINZEAN CHILDREN'S GAMES.
page.content: Outdoor favourites are still rounders, skipping, hopscotch, tig, marbles,hide and seek,football and netball.Children now have many more toys which may be very sophisticated technically.{Lego and other constructional toys have taken over from building bricks, there are{battery operated or remote-control models,tho'small boys still play most with the miniature models of{cars, {lorries and farm machinery}whilst the girls play with{dolls}from life-size baby to miniature teenage with dresses and hairstyles to be endlessly varied. {New are video and computer games}with most having a personal radio/recorder to listen to pop music and sometimes TV in the bedroom.Bicycles are used more for play than transport, with one boy's{BMX}the dream of the rest.{Card {and board games}are family favourites.
